title: [Large-Scale] Online Learning Design Utilizing Science Storytelling: Blended Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Digital devices (tablets/laptops) provided, combining offline workshops with online modules. Practicality of learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can design storytelling structures suitable for explaining scientific concepts.
Learners can produce science story content using digital tools (video editing software, infographic creation tools, etc.).
Learners can analyze the educational effectiveness and engagement level of science stories through peer assessment.

resources: Digital Content Templates for Science Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
